name: Project V.E.S.S.E.L
description: Project V.E.S.S.E.L is a 2D action game that sees you take control of Takumi Yamazaki, a Samurai in the future, set on a mission to kill all those involved with turning him into a robotic war machine. Shoot, Slash, and Dash your way through enemies using the abilities given to you by the same organization you seek destroy. Can you survive the trials that await you?
